Package com.flipfit.business

Class CustomerBusiness

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.business.CustomerBusiness
All Implemented Interfaces:
CustomerBusinessInterface
public class CustomerBusiness extends Object implements CustomerBusinessInterface
Author:
Abhinaya Business logic class for customer-related operations. This class acts as a service layer, orchestrating data access and applying business rules before interacting with the DAO layer.

    • isSlotBooked

      public boolean isSlotBooked(String slotId, Date date)
      Checks if a specific time slot has already been booked on a given date. This is useful for preventing double-booking. * @param slotId The unique identifier of the time slot.
      Specified by:
      isSlotBooked in interface CustomerBusinessInterface
      Parameters:
      date - The date for which to check the booking status.
      slotId - The unique identifier of the time slot.
      Returns:
      true if the slot is booked, false otherwise.

    • bookSlot

      public int bookSlot(String gymId, String slotId, String email, Date date)
      Books a time slot for a customer at a specific gym. * @param gymId The unique identifier of the gym center.
      Specified by:
      bookSlot in interface CustomerBusinessInterface
      Parameters:
      slotId - The unique identifier of the time slot to book.
      email - The email of the customer making the booking.
      date - The date for the booking.
      gymId - The unique identifier of the gym center.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the booking status (e.g., booking ID or a status code).
